attributes.action: public enquiry into chem-trails and their effect on human health.
attributes.additional_details:
Since approximately 1996, the Uk has been attacked by chem-trails.  The planes are now distinct, often with 4 jet nozzles.

Research suggests these planes are spewing out toxic metal pollution into our atmosphere.  Chem-trail blanket spraying is not only damaging our land, but also our health, and a public enquiry is needed immediately.  Nano-particulates are mutating the very genes of our plants, and insanity rains in our skies.
